title: Story
body:
In the land of monsters, every monster is unique..
<<next>>
Some have blue eyes, some have red. 
The red eyed one? His name is Ted.
<<next>> 
Some have 3 eyes. Sometimes more,
peeking from your closet door.
<<next>>
Test choice here.
[[Yes|StoryYes1]]  
[[No|StoryYes2]]

title: StoryYes1
body: Hello and hi hey great to meet you hey hi!

title: StoryYes2
body:
This is going to run an arbitrary command now.
<<test>>
<<next>>

title: StoryInterlude1
body:
Have you heard the one about ((name))?
<<n>>
((name)) has ((armType)) arms and ((eyeColor)) eyes.
<<n>>
One day, ((name)) was playing in the woods.
((name)) had a fun time jumping in the leaves.
<<n>>
The leaves, however, did not like being jumped in,
and they formed into a pile over a big hole.
<<n>>
((name)), not seeing the hole, jumped right into that big pile of leaves.
<<n>>
And he fell and fell and fell.. never to be seen again.
